name: Grymmlord'z GRIMBOAN
description:
Grymmlord'z GRIMBOAN....
There are 6 ways to end the situation,  only 1 of those ways is good.

Find your way home from this cursed place.

CONTROLS

Left arrow = move left
Right arrow = move right
Spacebar = jump
ESC = exit

TIPS

- Try not to overthink this.
- Standing still is a good idea sometimes.
-
